title: AbstractFacilityState
description: The life cycle status of a facility at some point in time.

EffectiveDateTime.description: The date and time at which the facility state becomes effective.

TerminationDateTime.description: The date and time at which the facility state is no longer in effect.

FacilityStateTypeID.description: Life Cycle [Facility State Type] is a set of major phases that are significant to regulators and/or business stakeholders. Life Cycle may apply to a well or its components [or other facility].
